      已过时。
      use Potion.renderHUDEffect(PotionEffect, net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui, int, int, float, float)
      void Potion.renderInventoryEffect​(int x, int y, PotionEffect effect, Minecraft mc)

      use Potion.renderInventoryEffect(PotionEffect, net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui, int, int, float)
